description.value:
Armor (Hide), Rare (Requires Attunement)
While wearing this armor, you can speak its command word to take on the form of a @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.npcs.Actor.4CrFraJ1x2kGXq8m]{giant constrictor snake}. You retain this form as long as you like, but once you return to your normal form, you cannot use it again until after a long rest.
